entry.content:
SEEMS LIKE THE SQUIRREL OF ATTACK MODE ON TIME. TO WAKE ME UP.

 NEXT PICTURE A LOVELY SERIES THAT TAKE S MY MIND OFF OF EVERYDAY THINGS AND MAKES ME LOVE JAZZ MUSIC, AINT MISBEHAVING !!!!LOL
LOST IS LALA LAND. SWEAR AT TIMES I THINK THIS IS REALLY WHAT IS IN MY BACK YARD. HIDDEN UNDER ALL THE UNDERGROWTH. WOULD LOVE TO SHARE THE STORIES OF B POTTER WHEN SHE SAW SOMETHING LIKE THESE IN HER STORIES.

TIME TO POST ANOTHER LOST MIND DAY. BLOOD PRESSURE OUT OF CONTROL AND ERIC NOT RESPONDING TO POST. GOT TO SEND SUE AND CLYDE THEIR CHRISTMAS PRESENTS.
LOVE TO ALL WHO ARE WONDERING WHAT IS TO COME AND WHAT HAS BEEN AND WOULD YOU LIVE YOUR LIVE OVER. NO NO NO  LOST IN TIME

SINCE NO ONE READS THIS , I AM GOING TO WRITE. A LITTLE RAGE.

We have had bad Presidents for years. Our country is on the brink of becoming just another country.
We have destroyed our way of life. Abortion is rampant . Murder is out of control. People are so political correct. the governments of other countries ban our people and we are supposed to bring in the militants that have started riots, raped people, burned down churches. and although no weapons in pictures , they have them waiting for them. San Bernadino Ca . and what does the Gov. of California ,he bans guns, who owns the guns,the people that want to control this country . Who cuts off the heads of people and a 10 year old child walks around with it , the head, like a ball.

This is not the country I want to live in.the world has become as bad as the Middle Ages.
Aids has infected the army as they spread their rapes and murders. Maybe this is how the plague started in the Middle Ages ,

Why can we not use the Constitution of our present , past, for our future.

All lives matter. and to see this bunch of paid thugs , burning and killing here in the states is too much. They are paid  protestors. MLK would not want them in his marches, Yes I lived thru that part of out history. The killing of a President , his brother , and MLK . bad times, seem nothing compared to the world that is being taken over .

Redoing my computer to a higher deal and checking to see what this and that will work, password for  Facebook only thing so far.

this month will be over soon. I hope July was great ,because Eric was here, bad  because of my meds screwing me up.

Got my bedroom almost finished and working on the moulding in closet.

this is amazing I have tried for 3 hours to get into this account and bingo , it went in like a champ.

Not much happening .

Painting finished in room , and ready to lay flooring. Bigger job than anticipated .

Picking up David today, his mom is taking his brother Noah back to college.   the difference in those two.

lots of changes in the last few years.  Starting with a scout camp and new schools and just being free to do what they can do.

The other brother has grown in confidence so much you would not believe how he matured.

love the girls too , but today the boys are on my mind.

entry.title: Jan 2015 Sam goes nuts
entry.content:
Today is Jan 19 2015 , Sunny and beautiful
today we had a beautiful persian grey cat in the house and Sam went nuts , He is so overprotective of me and his space , sometimes I feel he is demented.

Saw a movie yesterday and found an actor who looked as handsome as any I have seen in a long time.



Playing with the computer has got to stop at some point/

entry.title: Hackers hit Nick.
entry.content:
Today had gone well for me , but Nick,s account got hacked for a lot of money and he worked to get it back together, The bank says they will replace the money and it looks like it will be worked out.

It was a happy day today until this happened.


Had dinner with David and Ian.

slept for a couple of hours and now up and arguing with Sam.

entry.title: sunday. august 17
entry.content:
can not believe how the weather is not too hot not too cold , feels wonderful.

checking to see if this is working right again.

Sam attacked me again this morning, his checkmarks are stacking up , for him to be put in a zoo, cage, or something .  not really .

It looks like it worked.

Today is Nick jr Birthday.  46 years ago, we were in the hospital and he was hungry, with his little fist , up in the air , feed me. and I was in a sad shape, not able to get out of bed. One week later we went home.

He has been a pleasure and joy since I knew he was coming.

Love him and wish him many more days.

Brother Eric cam 18 months later , 2 great blessings .

It has been a great pleasure to know them both.

entry.title: Jonesie and Rose
entry.content:
Both are gone now, JJ passed in June of 2010 and Rose pseudo this year in june, she was very ill. Ran away one night and fell into a ditch of cold water

New cat named Sam, meanest cat I have ever owned.  Gift from Nick

Trying to set up blog on a new computer . Hope this works.

entry.title: Midnight and still up
entry.content:
Just moved the cat out of the way and fixed a wall, boy is it messy to patch a wall,
Rose is still muddling around, blind in one eye and almost blind in the other.

It is fall and the leaves are beautiful.  Up until last week I thought they were going to turn brown and fall off...

I looked out the kitchen window and it looked like a heavy rain of golden leaves and then I jumped in my car and took a long ride.  Maple leaves , Oak leaves , Sweet gum leaves and so many more.

The squirrels will not leave the bird feeder alone so brought it in for a few days.  Seems funny no birds have shown up to complain.

So much for Indian Summer , it has really turned chilly tonight.

entry.title: spring time finally
entry.content:
NHL party in 1981
Anna's beautiful Christmas lily
Spring trip to Utah, on road to Bryce Canyon

one of the few family pictures with me dad mom and louise.  taken at ford st home in the mid 40's war time and the few times we were all together.  love them and I am the last living person in this picture.  mom 1970 dad 1977 louise 2007.

entry.title: Friday April 5 2013
entry.content:
Bad news all around,  most people think the world is coming to an end,  Just an end to our lives as we know and remember them.

Dental appointment yesterday and being earlier than the appointment , I drove around the town I grew up visiting and working in, and could not locate half of the places I had lived or was associated with.

The place looked dreary and lonely, most of my friends and family are in the cementary or moved elsewhere.

Just too much change for a small town to a midsize town.

The theatre is now full of  live actors, not the musical movies, I loved so much in the 50,s ,  Houses that friends and family lived in , either rundown or fixed up to look great.

Just businesses everywhere.  The beer manufacture really has made a difference.

Last night the huge electrical plant had a major problem.  They look like steam engines or nuclar plants.never heard what happened to it.

Rain yesterday and the most beautiful sky today.  Love this change , sure do miss my Dogwood flowering trees.





Annagreth and me  , the Castle Queen of England family , Miss Rose Dawson, and my two favorite sons, when they were younger , now handsome young men.

entry.title: My thoughts for 2013 Sat mar 30
entry.content:
Saturday before Easter.

Thinking today of what it must have been like standing at the edge of the  crowd and watching the Rabbi being nailed to the wooden cross.  The two beside him.

He knew what was to happen but today it seems the athesit have tried every way to discredit Him.

Yet in my heart I know he is stronger than this evil that has taken over the world.  History repeating itself.

The two Marys at the foot of the cross crying, the crowd silent as the world rolls and thunder crashes, do they think"Oh my God , what have we done?"

Time will show them that it had to be that way,  That the people of the earth will need his love and courage for many lifetimes to come.

Schools teach evil and it goes out into the world and it gets meaner.  Bad people are put in charge of running this world but only He can make it better.

Share your love with all.  Not just the  ones near you. A smile can make someone think, there is love to spare even for me.

Have a Happy Easter and Greet the rising of the Son as a new beginning, when nothing will be the same and Evil will be overcome.

entry.title: David helps grammy
entry.content:
today after eating pizza tried to help grammy unable to get old location so passed her over to a new data base.

She will never be able to do anything with her apple except eat it.

She needs me and Eric just to keep her going.

Her I pad works but she is so computer illeriate that we have no hope for her

She is grateful for the help and it is senior day at Goodwill so she need her daily fix of shopping for bargins at the indoor yard sell. `

So this is how the other half lives
so many which to choose and which to share
finally a little brother who is now 6 ft 3 inches tall
had to find a really big hat for that hair.

love mom

entry.title: my America is going down the drain
entry.content:
I am watching a bunch of looney tunes tell the American people you have to wait 4 years to use this plan but we are going to tax the h... out of you and kill your jobs, lose the American credit rating , but most of all we lost a heck of a lot of good people over the last 300 years building this nation into what it was.

No more the congress , white house and the people we elected are turning us into one small do not care what you want or think country.

My generation is dying out and the new ones raised on Dr Spock the nutty child doctor, not the Vulcan.is taking over. Read history on the 60,s you will be surprised to see how the wild generations ideas are being enacted now.

I think I am going to go into a blue cloud and not come out till Nov and then vote, but by that time we will not have a vote. Just a check mark that the change guy has changed this country into a Kenyan province to be ruled by the mid eastern religion.

pictures/ Nick jr at one. Howard and Shorty shoot out. howard and family (most are gone now). Me tasting some weird fish dish. Eric at three

entry.title: I am here
entry.content:
I had to choose a whole new log in to reach this point, It is early morning and the day is cold , no snow. Full Moon and lots of signs the spring is about to spring.

My flowers that usually bloom have not even opened any buds yet.

Jonesy has begun to eat again and Rose looks awful, this morning I like to have never got her to wake up. she is old for a poodle, but it still scared me.

hope this thing works with adding pictures today .

entry.title: New Year How was yours?
entry.content:
so far I have had a year you can have.

Started out with me visiting England . Snowing for 3 weeks. Planes and roads messed up.

Anna and Eric were great, they put up with me. and showed me a great time.

We visited Brighton and The white cliffs of Dover. The river boat ride on the Thames, and shopping and seeing the Christmas lights and the Botany tour were all great.

Getting the munchies in the middle of the night and eating oranges was a total delight. I have not been able to be in the same room with citrus fruit for 20 years. Lost a filling of silver out of a tooth last year yep mercury fillings do cause the body to have bad reactions.

To Anna Mom thank you for the cookies they were great. Two oclock in the morning watching the snow covered world and eating them .

Just a few of what has happened since Dec 19 I lost a tooth cap to taffy candy.

I broke Anna lamp, poured a drink on her camera.
Ate them out of house and home, I did wash dishes, even tried to get out of washing stemware glasses but Eric waited me out and thank goodness none were broke.

Got home, computer got a virus that killed it. I dropped the phone and broke it, the doorbell was jammed and no longer works. Lost most of my pictures over the last 3 years.

Toyota was attacked by a problem that I feel is a hoax. I owe my life to the safety of their products. I will always buy that brand

My tag on the truck broke into 3 pieces when I tried to attach it. Has to be replace.

Nick loaned me phones that are better quality than I broke.

Eric ordered me an Apple computer and I am still trying to use it.

now i am going to try to attach a picture hope it works.

The life is given and blessings abound just keep believing.

D in Sue.s snuggie

entry.title: Comcast Email
entry.content:
For some reason I can not log in on my email account. What happened? Who knows . Comcast has a way of knocking me out of it everytime they update anything.

So if Anna or Eric read this would you like to let me know what to do.

Eric have you had you telephone installed yet?

love mom jj and rose

entry.title: The Movie
entry.content:
At 1115p last night I made my mind up that I could not wait to see the new Potter movie, so I made the 12 15 am show.

The audience was delightful. Some came as Potter fans in costume. The excitement had everyone stunned when the theater projecter went on the blink.

A theater employee was at the forefront asap. So we all watched the previews and the biggest Ahh came when the preview of the Twilight video came on with Edward in his red lipstick and his beautiful Bella.

Back to Potter. It was a very good movie. The book of course give more detail, but this was great with all the different ways of showing how they are maturing. Wish more of Jenny and Neville had been in it. Ron was great as the Q. goalie, especially in the tryout.

Rupert is a very good comedy actor.

Emma gets more beautiful with each passing day.

Daniel gets weirder , but adorable.

The special effects were wonderful. Dumbledore was so good you could believe he was a Merling living in todays world.

Jenny is something to be reckoned with being a 7th child in a wizard family.

Neville did some group shots but not much else. Love that character.

Snape still is Snape.

GO SEE THE MOVIE.

Pictures are courtesy of the comcast network copyright jkrowling and warner bros.

entry.title: Summer at the Lake
entry.content:
Rose and I took a little trip to the lake to see the sunset, tonight and these are what we saw.

They were so soothing I had to share them with you all .

entry.title: So How was your weekend
entry.content:
My was nothing to talk about. Just took a ride to the nearest casino.

The traffic on the other side of the express way was heavy. My side was very smooth. I go along listening to my audio book and trying to figure out why I am listening to a teen age heart throb book.

The weather was beautiful, not too hot and just sunny enough to enjoy everything and how green it was from all the rain this year.

Casino for about 30 minutes, I managed to loose my billfold and win $158.37 Just as I hit the jackpot my name was called over the loud speaker to report to security.

I checked for my keys, which I lost a set last time I went to North Carolina. In my pocket. Then I checked , no billfold.

Security had already found it and when I claimed it I left for home. No more chances of losing anything.

Today I slept and picked up Noah at scouts. David is off for the summer.

Both are going to camp in the next two weeks.

Their Dad is not going to make it. He is taking a few days off.

Eric is going to Germany for a few days. His birthday is coming up this month.

And now back to the retirement game. Love ya all

Anna's Birthday is Jun 19 Thank you for all you did for Dad

One for the few pictures of me and mom and dad and louise. of course i had to pose in the dress.

entry.title: June 6 1944
entry.content:
That day has been in the news a lot and it brought back a few memories of my Mom and one of her nephews, He never made it off the beach that day.

She told me in later years, before she passed away, that they had been close, he was the son she never had (her only son died at birth).

He among many others in the Howell, Shinall and Abernathy families went to war. Some came home and some did not.

Some died horribly later in life ,and some lived to a ripe old age.

Back to the story of DDay . Mom worked at Bell Bomber Plant in Marietta, home of the B29 that helped end the war.

She slept during the day, that day she had a visit from Paul, he was walking in a forest, so beautiful and was telling her, not to worry he was fine. He had not made it to Europe, and wanted her to know.

Mom never talked much about her visions and the blessed things like this that happened to her. Very seldom would she tell you how she knew what was going to happen or how she knew.

Needless to say she was Irish decent. Her grandmother came from the old country.

She was loved by many and died young. 58 years old .

I was expecting my 2nd child and she died in May and he was born early . June 24 . He was due around July 12th, so on that night I looked up to see her standing by the bed.

Like a nut case , I asked what she was doing here.

She was so beautiful, not all ravaged by the illness that had taken her in May. The light behind her was shining and she smiled the smile of angels.

She looked at the baby and smiled again, disappeared and I have never seen her since. Nice to know you have an angel in the family.
